candidates.why: Oracle command doc for CMD-072; exact workflow + phases + task-attachment semantics.
Same UI-design orchestrator family; shows unified --input parsing, directory setup, TodoWrite auto-continue, and attach→execute→collapse pattern.
Orchestrator-style wrapper that validates params, composes subcommands, and documents TodoWrite + error handling patterns.
Downstream assembler phase; defines output verification and prototypes/preview artifacts.
Conditional Phase 0.5 pattern; shows file discovery + parallel extraction outputs used as upstream context.

selected.why: Selected because CMD-072 explicitly targets this command and the repo already contains the full oracle doc.
